Paper.Title: Sinica Treebank: Design Criteria, Annotation Guidelines, and On-line Interface

Section.Paragraph: This paper describes the design criteria and annotation guidelines of Sinica Treebank. The three design criteria are: Maximal Resource Sharing,

Optimal Semantic Information. One of the important design decisions following these criteria is the encoding of thematic role information. An on-line interface facilitating empirical studies of Chinese phrase structure is also described.
